name: Lunar Excursion
description:
What Is This Game?

Play through my take on the classic lunar lander game.  You will need to pay more attention to the physics aspects of the landing to make sure that you don't land at more than 5m/s and at less than a 20-degree angle. 

Controls

InputTypeOutcomeA or Left ArrowHoldRotate ClockwiseD or Right ArrowHoldRotate CounterClockwiseLeft ShiftHoldThrottle UpLeft ControlHoldThrottle DownZPressSet Throttle to 100XPressSet Throttle to 0EscapePressPause Game
